attributes.action: Make the purchase and resale of practical driving tests illegal.
attributes.additional_details: People describing themselves a “driving test brokers” are buying and reselling tests making it incredibly difficult to book a driving test using bots to book tests before any person can. I need one for my job and can not book a test. These self claimed “brokers” are selling test dates at prices up to £400 and a lot of these test sales are scams. It is breaking the country, making it difficult for those who need it and in plain words is the work of greed and laziness.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to buy and resell driving test dates due to the impact it’s having on the ability to book a driving test.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Review process for booking driving tests and ban the resale at inflated prices - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702760
